00191 inline unsigned char& Clip::operator() (const unsigned int &row, const unsigned int &column)
00192 {
00193     if ( (row >= height_) or (column >= width_) )
00194         throw NessieException ("Clip::operator() : Subscripts are out bounds");
00195 
00196     return pixels_[row * width_ + column];
00197 };
00198 
00199 
00200 inline unsigned char Clip::operator() (const unsigned int &row, const unsigned int &column) const
00201 {
00202     if ( (row >= height_) or (column >= width_) )
00203         throw NessieException ("Clip::operator() : Subscripts are out bounds");
00204 
00205     return pixels_[row * width_ + column];
00206 };

00209 inline Clip& Clip::operator= (const Clip& clip)
00210 {
00211     // Delete previous data
00212     delete[] this->pixels_;
00213     this->pixels_   = 0;
00214     
00215     // Assign members
00216     this->row_      = clip.row_;
00217     this->column_   = clip.column_;
00218     this->width_    = clip.width_;
00219     this->height_   = clip.height_;
00220     this->size_     = clip.size_;
00221     
00222     // Allocate space
00223     this->pixels_ = new unsigned char[clip.size_];
00224     
00225     // Copy the data from the source clip
00226     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < clip.size_; ++i )
00227         this->pixels_[i] = clip.pixels_[i];
00228     
00229     return *this;
00230 };
